---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/solana/delegate/get-flow-status-delegation_activating
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/e2285668-f6ab-4b77-9e96-edbcca63cd24' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegation_activating` to `delegation_active`.

:::

#### Sample Response `delegation_activating`

```json {4,8}
{
  "id": "e2285668-f6ab-4b77-9e96-edbcca63cd24",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "delegation_activating",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-03-02T04:42:16.214Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "9UPYJp5pApSEaeCizrvqe6vx7hSj3ZPzVDLZHG4hxk3x",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "28xHAnmmVY6A2wfwe4v1LeoeS3qPBYL4haajmswwfVZ4JVsobeTCzoksVjZjgzzKtbJpCnraCquUwTiYRvkXpoKb",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T07:55:33.000Z"
    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "4.0",
    "validator_address": "DNTc4P9ngY51Uc8hXSjhJdZdLTxyx7j1N1GbfXjVkLPr",
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "5hbND6b542r6sPsgmTma5fY6DoG69tBYPhidRujWPnAtLvSJMb4LZtCqUG2DJ7BuejAJbUf3SPWokHMWWeyxx4XC",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T08:02:35.000Z"
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "3997717120.0",
    "delegation_status": "activating",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": "2023-03-02T04:42:16.214Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T07:04:33.714Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T08:03:01.664Z"
}
```

#### Sample Response `delegation_active`

```json {4}
{
  "id": "e2285668-f6ab-4b77-9e96-edbcca63cd24",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "delegation_active",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "9UPYJp5pApSEaeCizrvqe6vx7hSj3ZPzVDLZHG4hxk3x",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "28xHAnmmVY6A2wfwe4v1LeoeS3qPBYL4haajmswwfVZ4JVsobeTCzoksVjZjgzzKtbJpCnraCquUwTiYRvkXpoKb",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T07:55:33.000Z"
    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "4.0",
    "validator_address": "DNTc4P9ngY51Uc8hXSjhJdZdLTxyx7j1N1GbfXjVkLPr",
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "5hbND6b542r6sPsgmTma5fY6DoG69tBYPhidRujWPnAtLvSJMb4LZtCqUG2DJ7BuejAJbUf3SPWokHMWWeyxx4XC",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T08:02:35.000Z"
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "6997717120.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_status": "active",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": "2023-03-02T04:42:16.214Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T07:04:33.714Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-02T04:05:23.467Z"
}
```

### Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your stake is now active and earning rewards!
